accessibility.title: Accessibility First
accessibility.description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant components with full keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Mobile-first approach with breakpoints at 375px, 768px, and 1280px for perfect adaptation.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: Optimized bundle size and runtime performance. First Load JS under 140KB.

typescript.title: TypeScript Ready
typescript.description: 100% TypeScript support with comprehensive type definitions and IntelliSense.

theming.title: Advanced Theming
theming.description: Light/Dark mode support with CSS custom properties and design tokens.

developer.title: Developer Experience
developer.description: Excellent documentation, Storybook integration, and comprehensive testing.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers building amazing products with Morning AI Design System.
